attributes.action: Ban trade of foiegras within UK/ ban the importation of foiegras into Britain.
attributes.additional_details:
Eating foiegras can trigger diseases that people predisposed to such as Alzheimer’s CJD and diabetes. 
See video produced by PETA https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9F4SIkRprrc
This tortuous behaviour towards a living creature is not acceptable to me, I hope it isn’t acceptable to you. Please sign and share this petition to get foiegras banned from UK soil for good.
attributes.background: Britain should ban the trade and importation of foiegras because to produce “foie gras”  workers ram pipes down the throats of male ducks or geese three times a day, up to 4 pounds daily. The force-feeding causes the birds’ livers to swell to up to 10 times their normal size.
